name: Sedatephobia
description:
Experience the terror of silence. Travel alone in the darkness, and be careful about which thoughts you indulge...

Controls: 

WASD — move 

Move your mouse to look around.

Credits: 

Nneka Benjamin - 3D

Tristan Durocher - narrative design and programming

Noah MacDonald - programming

Fanny Ouellet - narrative design and dialogue writing

Bradley Rich - game design
